unnormalised: Renowned chef, Chef Vikas Khanna, added another feather to his cap, bagging the "Humanitarian Award" at the NYC South Asian Film Festival. Congrats to him!
normalised: Renowned chef, Chef Vikas Khanna, added another feather to his cap, bagging the "Humanitarian Award" at the N-Y-C South Asian Film Festival. Congrats to him!

unnormalised: The award recognises Chef Khanna's tireless efforts during the COVID-19 pandemic, where he organised a massive food distribution drive across India. Apparently, he managed to provide meals to lakhs of people. What a guy!
normalised: The award recognises Chef Khanna's tireless efforts during the C-O-V-I-D-nineteen pandemic, where he organised a massive food distribution drive across India. Apparently, he managed to provide meals to lakhs of people. What a guy!

unnormalised: Meanwhile, back home, social media is abuzz with speculation about actress Ms. Deepika Padukone's upcoming movie. Sources say the film is a period drama, and she's playing the role of a queen. Can't wait for it!
normalised: Meanwhile, back home, social media is abuzz with speculation about actress M-s. Deepika Padukone's upcoming movie. Sources say the film is a period drama, and she's playing the role of a queen. Can't wait for it!

unnormalised: Also, a big shoutout to student activist, Mr. Rakesh Sharma, for his work on environmental issues. He's been nominated for the "Young Environmentalist" award. Let’s hope he wins! Good luck, Rakesh!
normalised: Also, a big shoutout to student activist, M-r. Rakesh Sharma, for his work on environmental issues. He's been nominated for the "Young Environmentalist" award. Let’s hope he wins! Good luck, Rakesh!
